itunes:title: Starting A Protein Company
title: Starting A Protein Company
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Starting a protein company, running from the cops, being hired as a security guard, tripping at Runyon, and Ilya fixes Jason's toilet. Thanks for listening, honestly you guys are the best! love you // Joe and Ilya
